changeInfoExamination(JList, ArrayList<Examen>, ArrayList<Patient>, JTextField, JComboBox, JDateChooser) - Static method in class com.functions.ExaminationFunction
this function is used to change the informations of an Examen
The function used is related to the state of the temporaryList if the temporaryList is empty changeInfoExaminationFronArrayExamination() if put in action else changeInfoExaminationFromTemporaryList() is used
changeInfoExaminationFromTemporaryList(JList, ArrayList<Examen>, ArrayList<Patient>, JTextField, JComboBox, JDateChooser) - Static method in class com.functions.ExaminationFunction
this function is used to change the informations of an Examen from the temporaryList
The index of the row selected in the graphic list is registered, if the result of the selected index equals -1 the function isn't executed The informations in the fields are checked Then the Examen stored at the selected index in the temporaryList is extracted and it's values updated The temporaryList is cleared Finally the updated arrayExamination is displayed in the JList
changeInfoExaminationFronArrayExamination(JList, ArrayList<Examen>, ArrayList<Patient>, JTextField, JComboBox, JDateChooser) - Static method in class com.functions.ExaminationFunction
this function is used to change the informations of an Examen from the arrayExamination
The index of the row selected in the graphic list is registered, if the result of the selected index equals -1 the function isn't executed The informations in the fields are checked Then the Examen stored at the selected index in the arrayExamination is extracted and it's values udpated Finally the updated arrayExamination is displayed in the JList
changeInfoPatient(JList, ArrayList<Patient>, JTextField, JRadioButton, JRadioButton, JTextField, JTextField, JTextField, JTextField, JTextField, JTextField, JTextField, JTextField, JTextField, JDateChooser) - Static method in class com.functions.PatientFunction
this function is used to change the informations of a patient
The function used is related to the state of the temporaryList if the temporaryList is empty changePatientArrayPatient() if put in action else changePatientTemporaryList() is used
changePatientArrayPatient(JList, ArrayList<Patient>, JTextField, JRadioButton, JRadioButton, JTextField, JTextField, JTextField, JTextField, JTextField, JTextField, JTextField, JTextField, JTextField, JDateChooser) - Static method in class com.functions.PatientFunction
this function is used to change the informations of a Patient from arrayPatient
This function can only be used through changeInfoPatient() If the result of the selected index equals -1 the function isn't executed The informations in the fields are checked Then the Patient stored at the selected index in the arrayPatient is extracted and it's values udpated Finally the updated arrayPatient is displayed in the JList

changePatientTemporaryList(JList, ArrayList<Patient>, JTextField, JRadioButton, JRadioButton, JTextField, JTextField, JTextField, JTextField, JTextField, JTextField, JTextField, JTextField, JTextField, JDateChooser) - Static method in class com.functions.PatientFunction
this function is used to change the informations of a Patient from temporaryList
This function can only be used through changeInfoPatient() If the result of the selected index equals -1 the function isn't executed The informations in the fields are checked Then the Patient stored at the selected index in the temporaryList is extracted and it's values udpated The temporaryList is cleared after the changes have been processed Finally the updated arrayPatient is displayed in the JList
checkIfExist(ArrayList<Patient>, int) - Static method in class com.functions.PatientFunction
this function is used to check if a Patient exists in the arrayPatient
A loop is used to compare the id of the stored Patients in the arrayPatient with the id selected If the patient has been found the loop is broken Else all the Patients in the arrayPatient are checked, then the loop ends
checkUpAvailableAreaCode(JTextField) - Static method in class com.treatment.PatientControler
this function is used to certify that the area code is correct
A loop is used to compare the area code written by the user to the area code in arrayAreaCode If it matches codeOk is set on true
checkUpAvailableCellphoneNumber(JTextField) - Static method in class com.treatment.PatientControler
this function is used to certify that the cellphone number is correct
If the phone number start with one of the beginning number of the array If it matches phoneNumber is set on true
checkUpAvailableEmail(JTextField) - Static method in class com.treatment.PatientControler
this function is used to certify that the Email is correct
The email is stored in a String variable IndexOf is used to check the @ in the email address The information isn't correct the boolean fieldOk is set on false An error message is sent to the user

checkUpJDateChooserDateInput(JDateChooser) - Static method in class com.treatment.ExaminationControler
this function is used to certify that the information sent by the user is correct
In a try / catch block the date selected in the JDateChooser field is stored in a Date Object If the Date isn't null boolean fieldOk is set on true if an error occurs, the catch block set the examination date to default date at today

checkUpJRadioButtonInput(JRadioButton, JRadioButton) - Static method in class com.treatment.PatientControler
this function is used to certify that the information sent by the user is correct
Those two JRadioButton are member of a same ButtonGroup, it doesn't allow them to have the same value If those two have the same value so no selection has been done by the user FieldOk is set on false

creatExamination(JList, JList, ArrayList<Patient>, ArrayList<Examen>, JTextField, JComboBox, JDateChooser) - Static method in class com.functions.ExaminationFunction
this function is used to create an Examen object
before the creation of the Examen all the field are check then the Patient for whom this Examen is instantiate is extract from the arrayPatient The examination's informations are displayed in the JList Finally the fields are cleared automatically of the previous informations
creatPatient(JList, ArrayList<Patient>, JTextField, JRadioButton, JRadioButton, JTextField, JTextField, JTextField, JTextField, JTextField, JTextField, JTextField, JTextField, JTextField, JDateChooser, ButtonGroup, JDateChooser) - Static method in class com.functions.PatientFunction
this function is used to create a Patient object
before the creation of the Patient all the field are check Then those informations are used to instantiate a Patient The Patient stored in the arrayPatient are displayed in the JList Finally the fields are cleared automatically of the previous informations
